an6.81:1.1: “Mendicants, someone with six qualities is placed in hell as if delivered there.
an6.81:1.3: They kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, and lie. And they have corrupt wishes and wrong view.
an6.81:1.4: Someone with these six qualities is placed in hell as if delivered there.
an6.81:2.1: Someone with six qualities is placed in heaven as if delivered there.
an6.81:2.3: They don’t kill living creatures, steal, commit sexual misconduct, or lie. And they have few desires and right view.
an6.81:2.4: Someone with these six qualities is placed in heaven as if delivered there.”
